net.sf.javaml.filter
Interface InstanceFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFilter, CeilValueFilter, ClassReplaceFilter, EqualWidthBinning, FloorValueFilter, InstanceNormalizeMidrange, NormalizeMean, NormalizeMeanIQR135, NormalizeMidrange, RemoveAttributes, ReplaceValueFilter, ReplaceWithValue, RetainAttributes, RoundValueFilter, UnsetClassFilter
public interface InstanceFilter

The interface for filters that can be applied on an Instance without the need for a reference Dataset. When applying a filter to an instance it may modify the instance and will return the modified version of the instance.

Version:
0.1.5
Author:
Thomas Abeel (thomas@abeel.be)
See Also:
Instance, Dataset

Method Summary
 void filter(Instance inst)
          Applies this filter to an instance

filter

void filter(Instance inst)
Applies this filter to an instance

Parameters:
inst - the instance to apply this filter to
